mapper.select: select t_user.id AS user_id, t_user.username, t_user.password, t_user.remark, t_user.email, t_user.createTime, t_user.updateTime, t_role.id AS role_id, t_role.name, t_role.keyword, t_role.description from (select id, username, password, remark, email, createTime, updateTime from t_user order by id limit #{beginIndex},#{size})as t_user inner join t_user_role inner join t_role on t_user.id = t_user_role.user_id and t_role.id=t_user_role.role_id
